title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, December 12, 2020
description: It's the birthday of painter Edvard Munch, who said, "My fear of life is necessary to me, as is my illness. Without anxiety and illness, I am a ship without a rudder."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of painter Edvard Munch, who said, "My fear of life is necessary to me, as is my illness. Without anxiety and illness, I am a ship without a rudder."
